name: trop-kick
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
